item.title: Nikola Corp S-1
item.description: Nikola Corp, which is in the Motor Vehicles & Passenger Car Bodies [3711] industry, SEC S-1 filing on July 22, 2021 had 76520 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 905 instances 2020 - 807 instances company - 688 instances business - 552 instances nikola - 495 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
